name: Purple Toad Must Know
description:
The goal of the game is to manage a show and earn ratings and revenue

There are three different ways to earn ratings:
1. Change the camera to whoever's talking
2. Play Sound effects at the right times
3. And change the lightings to fit the different phases of the show

Revenue can be earn by playing ads, but this comes at the cost of ratings, so be careful.

Tips:
-Purple toad turns towards the camera when making a joke

-Playing sounds several times in a row loses ratings

-Having the camera zoomed out loses less ratings than having it zoomed into the wrong frog. The same thing applies when using the normal lights.

-The change in music denotes the different phases of the show
